One Less Worry, Period.

Let your birth be one less worry.

Read More

Our Mission

One Less Worry Period (OLWP) is committed to providing all birthing people with love, dignity, and respect during this transformative time in their lives. By providing support, perspective, trust, advocacy, and a sense of community, OLWP promises to help birthing people have one less worry during this beautiful and critical time. We put the needs of birthing people first.

Become a client today

My Role As Your Doula

My role as your doula is to provide ongoing emotional and physical support. I bring a heart of understanding, a listening ear, a soothing touch, a wealth of knowledge and a tenacity for learning and growing. Our birthing journey also includes the following:

The Processes

Prenatal meetings where we will discuss your birthing plans and comfort techniques

Accessible Resources

On-demand support, educational resources, and prenatal community

Day-of Labor Support

Attending your birth and supporting you through the labor process

Lactation and Postpartum Support

Providing breastfeeding support and postpartem check-ins

What my clients have to say

Testimonials

Crystal being my doula was an amazing experience, her encouraging words helped me so much even before going into labor. Her calming words as I was pushing was exactly what I needed. Even after the baby she’s been here to help every step of the way with all my questions and concerns she’s simply amazing and I’d recommend her to any and everybody.

Kellye, new mother

As an active doula and mentor it is a continued pleasure to mentor Crystal. She has shown great readiness to learn and support families and is highly receptive to advice and guidance. As a mentee she knows she always has me in her back pocket when needing advice at prenatals or births and that is an extra perk from a business perspective. Crystal has recently shared wanting to add lactation support to her bag of tools and I think that will further her skillset, make her more marketable and with lactation being my passion I am excited for her personal journey with learning newborn feeding.

Simone Toomer, Doula, Lactation Counselor, Educator, Mentor
